summary:
Way back when I was in fourth grade, I needed something to listen to on the bus to a class field trip. 
Naturally, I turned to my dad, who had a pretty big collection of 80s rock.  I had been listening to music from the likes of REO Speedwagon, Eddie Money, Quiet Riot, Bon Jovi, and a million other groups since my parents got married...
